summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1512, for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, in the City of Seattle from Franking Avenue to Eastlake Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 16194 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
